p: Microbial cultures of three bacterial strains ( E. coli (ATCC 25922), P. aeruginosa (ATCC 15442) and S. aureus (ATCC 25923)) were purchased from Huan Kai Microbiology Technology Co. (Guangzhou, China). Fungal strains ( Candida albicans (ATCC 10231) and S. cerevisiae (ATCC 9080)) were also purchased from Huan Kai Microbiology Technology Co. (Guangzhou, China).
